title: 09/17/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/17/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's game between the Giants and Washington Football Team. Where should the Giants go from here? Former NFL QB and now NBC Analyst Drew Brees calls in to discuss which schools didn't recruit him and how often he talks to Saints' Personnel. And Documentarian Ken Burns joins us to discuss his new documentary on Muhammed Ali.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
